short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts your contributions and shows how active you've been today. Contribute more for the greater good! Be a progaholic!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Progaholic is a browser plugin to show how much you contributed today. The plugin counts your contributions (pushes, issues, etc) and shows how active you've been today on every web page you visit. The idea is to encourage you to do more instead of pointless web surfing.

Suitable for programmers, technical writers, QA engineers and anyone, who use GitHub, GitLab or BitBucket every day. 

Contribute more for the greater good! Be a progaholic!

More information is here: https://github.com/dsavenko/progaholic

Please, send me feedback, like bug reports, feature requests or pull requests! The best way would be by filing issues on GitHub. You can also mail me at ds@dsavenko.com.
